page.title: 14Transport
page.content: There are frequent{buses to Norwich {and Ipswich}along the A140 road, but elsewhere in the area transport services are minimal. The{Eastern {Counties Bus Company}has closed routes and some residents have to rely on an infrequent community bus and an irregular service run by a private bus company which calls at Fritton. Car ownership is therefore very high with residents depending on their vehicles for all social, shopping and work journeys. Roads are generally very narrow and subject to{flooding at {fords}in rainy periods and to{blockage {by snow}in Winter. Many people continue to use cycles for most journeys. Transport is therefore a significant expense for all families.Pupils have transport to school and workers to their factories.
